dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4586 IH: ThinkDIFFERENTLY Agriculture Accessibility Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself and Ms. Caraveo) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to modify and extend grants for assistive technology programs for farmers with disabilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ThinkDIFFERENTLY Agriculture Accessibility Act of 2023.
Section 1680 of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5933) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking Assistive technology program for farmers with disabilities and inserting ThinkDIFFERENTLY National AgrAbility Project;

clause.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (E), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: provide education and support to youth and young adults with disabilities interested in farming and farm-related occupations.

clause.text: in the paragraph heading, by striking amount and inserting and maximum amounts; and
by inserting and not more than $260,000 after $150,000; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
$8,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2033.
